subject: College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Auburn kept quarterback Cam Newton eligible by successfully arguing to the N.C.A.A. that a former Mississippi State player did not act as an agent during his recruitment by that program, newly released documents reveal.
snippet: Auburn kept quarterback Cam Newton eligible by successfully arguing to the N.C.A.A. that a former Mississippi State player did not act as an agent during his recruitment by that program, newly released documents reveal.
